feature.name: SignageStudio Web / Desktop - acceso a todas las características principales de studio - múltiples OS
feature.extra: Use the powerful SignageStudio (web or desktop versions) and build an elaborate campaign using MRSS, RSS, Live TV, HD Videos, swf animation, Weather, Stock and much more. Manage all your campaigns and unlimited remote signage players.

feature.name: SignageStudio Mobile / Web/Desktop – acceso a todas las funciones del reproductor - múltiples OS
feature.extra: Digital Signage, robust, cross platform Players with full remote access. Use Unlimited licenses (install unlimited SignagePlayers) and all for FREE. The FREE SignagePlayer include the iPhone, iPad, Android, Windows, Linux and Mac versions.

feature.name: SignageMobile control remoto
feature.extra: Manage your remote players using any smart phone including Android and iPhone. Get Live Snapshots and push updates all from your mobile device.

feature.name: Cientos de recursos compartidos, plantillas, muestras y escenarios
feature.extra: Take advantage of hundreds of pre-made Scenes, Weather, Vector based background, clocks, dynamic digital menu boards, carousels, editable directories and more. Also you can pick from dozens of fully editable Signage templates.

feature.name: Almacenaje completo en mediaCLOUD
feature.extra: Enterprise users receives unlimited storage on the mediaCLOUD to store videos, animation and images. None Enterprise Users total server storage set to 1 Gigabyte.

feature.name: Ancho de banda de red
feature.extra: Enterprise users can download and upload with no limits as we do not cap bandwidth speeds. None Enterprise Users bandwidth limits to be announced.

feature.name: Gestión multi usuario
feature.extra: Collaborate with other users. Work together on the same campaign and use source control to merge your work. Use perforce like features to manage your updates between you and other team members.

feature.name: Acceso central a SignageStudio
feature.extra: Manage unlimited number of accounts and remote SignagePlayer all using central login. Get a global view of your entire player stats and receive live notifications.

feature.name: Acceso a EnterpriseStudio
feature.extra: Manage your network, setup branding, apply permissions, inject access control lists and more, all using single point and click management.

feature.name: SignageStudio marca blanca / marca
feature.extra: Brand the entire solution. Copy and paste the provided HTML snippet and allow customer login and create new account access directly from your own web site. All with your own domain, custom logos and link backs.

feature.name: SignagePlayer actualizaciones inmediatas
feature.extra: When pushing updates from the SignageStudio to SignagePlayers, Enterprise branded splash screen (your logo) will appear for 1-2 seconds before new campaign is loaded; compared to none Enterprise SignagePlayers which will display MediaSignage Logo for 20 seconds or more.

feature.name: SignagePlayer marca blanca / marca
feature.extra: Set the SignagePlayers to display your company’s information anytime the Player is started or rebooted. Make MediaSignage transparent to your clients.

feature.name: Integración de marca SignagePlayer
feature.extra: Embed the SignagePlayer Embedded version directly onto your own web site. Enterprise edition users can remove the Copyrights snippet and set no references to MediaSignage, make it your own.

feature.name: Gestor de anuncios
feature.extra: Manage thousands of Ads across any number of businesses using the “Incoming” Ad Manager module and provide proof of play to your advertises. Set Approval rules and schedule Advertising start and end dates.

feature.name: Motor de anuncios
feature.extra: Take advantage of our robust Advertising Engine, read more and checkout the video tutorial here: Advertising Engine

feature.name: Lista de control de acceso
feature.extra: Access Control Lists allow you to set specific regions within the SignageStudio using detailed 8 levels of control. Hide area you do not want specific users to access while maintaining full admin access to others.

feature.name: Privilegios
feature.extra: Privileges are set to control what users can do within the SignageStudio. Privileges include, read, update and modify control. Create unlimited number of sub-users each with its own privileged group assignment.

feature.name: Gestión central multi negocio
feature.extra: Get a global view of all businesses across the entire network from a central studio manager.

feature.name: Gestión central multi reproductor
feature.extra: Get a global view of all Players across the entire network from a central studio manager.

feature.name: Gestión multi usuario
feature.extra: Create unlimited number of users each with its own ACL and permission group. Use default privileges for easy group privileged assignment.

feature.name: Temas personalizados SignageStudio y control CSS
feature.extra: Choose a custom look and feel for the SignageStudio through pre-configured CSS Themes (Themes are based on a light and dark coloring scheme).

feature.name: Acceso a todos los components mediaSTORE
feature.extra: Get all the latest Digital Signage components and all are included with the Enterprise account. Some of these components include XML, Facebook, Twitter, Collection, Form, QR code and more.

feature.name: Acceso API
feature.extra: Develop your own interface using the Application Programming Interface for your Advertisers using web services and embed onto your own web site. Use any programming language including ActionScript 3, ASP.NET, PHP and more. Create a fully automated system with your CMS for Ad package creation, resource uploads and more.

feature.name: Acceso SDK
feature.extra: The Software Development Kit is a set of libraries that allow you to easily develop SignageStudio and SignagePlayer components. The components are developed using the open source Adobe® / Flex SDK™ and compiled against our provided open source library. You start with a working example and modify it to build your first component.

feature.name: Biblioteca privada de recursos, vídeos, fondos y máscaras
feature.extra: Access hundreds of pre-made resources including backgrounds, masks, source SDKs, videos, images, swf animations and more.

feature.name: Soporte chat en directo (7 días a la semana)
feature.extra: We are always here to support you, just click on the Live Chat right from the SignageStudio or from the MediaSignage web site and speak to a professional support team member. We work extra hard for you including Saturday and Sunday.

feature.name: Derechos totales de venta de la solución completa
feature.extra: Resell the entire MediaSignage as your own to anyone and generate revenue. Manage unlimited number of clients and unlimited number of Digital Signage screens.

feature.name: Soporte ilimitado mediaSERVER
feature.extra: MediaSignage dedicated support through phone, email, forum and Live Chat. Support is guaranteed within 24 hours. Normally we reply to Enterprise member inquiries within 1 hour of extended business hours.

feature.name: Soporte técnico telefónico
feature.extra: Receive priority dedicated phone support and technical assistance. Support is guaranteed within 24 hours. Normally we reply to Enterprise member inquiries within 1 hour of extended business hours.

feature.name: Descuentos en mediaBOX
feature.extra: Receive 5% OFF the mediaBOX (all version including Linux / Ubuntu and Windows / Embedded version.

feature.name: Descuentos en licencias mediaSERVER
feature.extra: Get lower prices on the mediaSERVER Licenses. Prices drop to as low as $130.00 per single license (depends on volume).

feature.name: Soporte email sin marca para sus clientes
feature.extra: provide none branded email support to your customers through our professional support team.

feature.name: Material de Marketing para revendedores promocionando a su empresa
feature.extra: Take advantage of marketing material including flyers, brochures, business card, white papers and more. Download the source files and modify with your own company’s logo and information.

feature.name: Participación en programa de generación de leads
feature.extra: Receive leads generated from potential new clients and increase your business exposure.

feature.name: Acceso a mediaADNET
feature.extra: Expose your Advertising Network through our mediaADNET and increase the exposure of your screens to national and international advertisers.

feature.name: Links de MediaSignage.com a su web
feature.extra: Increase online traffic to your own Digital Signage web site through link backs and access the partner program.

feature.name: Acceso anticipado a promociones especiales y paquetes descuento
feature.extra: Receive early access to special discounts, promotions and news.

feature.name: Consulting general
feature.extra: Consult our support team for additional information and resources concerning Digital Signage installation, maintenance and setup.

feature.name: Acceso directo a los video tutoriales online
feature.extra: Host the entire video tutorials content library on your own web site, none branded.

feature.name: Permisos para utilización del material de la web MediaSignage.com
feature.extra: Copy and paste information from the MediaSignage.com web site to your own site and promote your company with proven content.
